Coronary artery disease, blood clots, and stroke are all complex conditions and are caused by a combination of many genetic and environmental factors. Some rare MTHFR gene mutations can lead to homocystinuria, which is inherited in an autosomal recessive manner. Visit our ""Homocystinuria due to MTHFR deficiency"" webpage.",GARD,MTHFR gene mutation
